title: Plat du Refuse? WTF?!
body: <p>At $15.75 it looks (and sounds) like it's the most expensive fake plate in existence.</p><p><a href="http://www.democratandchronicle.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20050405/LIVING/504050312" title="Upscale restaurant gives Garbage Plate a French name"><img src="http://cmsimg.democratandchronicle.com/apps/pbcsi.dll/bilde?Site=A2&amp;Date=20050405&amp;Category=LIVING&amp;ArtNo=504050312&amp;Ref=AR&amp;Profile=1032&amp;MaxW=550&amp;MaxH=430" alt="Plat du Refuse from Horizons at the Lodge at Woodcliff" /></a></p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2005-04-13

Plat du Refuse? WTF?!

At $15.75 it looks (and sounds) like it's the most expensive fake plate in existence.

bodyNavItems.text: It starts with a fruit fly
